long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You are in Korea and want to take the train for the weekend but all tickets are sold.
Use Easy Train! 
- Go to letskorail.com (the official website for train selling tickets in Korea)
- Fill the form 
- Let the app bring you to the payment page and protect your ticket for some minutes
